sentences.en: A new method to evaluate effect of decoy in the infrared band is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种新的评价假目标红外特征的方法.

sentences.en: Can you recall any instances of decoy pricing you've seen?
sentences.cn: 你能想起你见过的欺诈定价的例子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dummy building: Creates a decoy building.
sentences.cn: 空壳建筑: 建造一座诱饵建筑.

sentences.en: He used a whistle to decoy the birds within range.
sentences.cn: 他用口哨把鸟群诱至射程内.

sentences.en: He was booked on a flight leaving that day, but that was just a decoy.
sentences.cn: 他订了那天起飞的航班，但那不过是个诱饵。

sentences.en: In war this general is excellent at decoy tactics.
sentences.cn: 这位将军作战时善于声东击西.

sentences.en: IR active jamming technology includes IR decoy , IR jammer, DIRCM laser blinding, etc.
sentences.cn: 红外有源干扰技术包括红外干扰弹 、 外干扰机、向红外对抗和激光致盲等.

sentences.en: Nick acted as a decoy after the dog attacked a group of children swimming in the river.
sentences.cn: 那只狗攻击了在河里游泳的一群孩子后，尼克作诱饵要将其捉住。

sentences.en: Officer Langley acted as a decoy to catch the rapist.
sentences.cn: 警员兰利充当诱饵来抓捕那名强奸犯。

sentences.en: One who acts as a decoy, as in a confidence game.
sentences.cn: 诱骗者，赌棍同伙充当眼线的人，如在一场骗局中。

sentences.en: The girls decoy more easily than most other children.
sentences.cn: 这些女孩比其他大多数孩子们更容易被诱骗.

sentences.en: The man used his shop as a decoy for poor girls.
sentences.cn: 犯人以其店铺作为引诱贫女的陷阱.

sentences.en: The system focuses on the counterwork stage between decoy and torpedo.
sentences.cn: 该系统将目标定位于声诱饵诱骗鱼雷的对抗阶段.

sentences.en: The use of Ozawa's impotent carriers as a decoy force was brilliant.
sentences.cn: 利用小泽那几条脆弱的航空母舰作为一支诱敌舰队,这个战略也是十分巧妙的.

sentences.en: These pellets could burst the decoy balloons that would accompany a swarm of warheads.
sentences.cn: 这些子弹能摧毁伴随许多枚弹头的假目标--气球.

sentences.en: To lure or entrap by or as if by a decoy.
sentences.cn: 诱捕用诱饵吸引或设陷阱.

sentences.en: Under this is the sunset glow shines upon the decoy launching.
sentences.cn: 这是晚霞映照下的发射场.

trans.tran_en: a model of a bird used to attract wild birds so that you can watch them or shoot them
